paper_abstract: The surface structure, surface energy, and surface vacancy formation energy for B and N vacancy of the cubic boron nitride (c-BN)(110) surface have been investigated by performing Hartree-Fock and DFT calculations. Results are compared with available literature values. The vacancy formation energies [unrelaxed (E-f(o)) and relaxed (E-f)] axe reported for the first time for c-BN(110).
paper_title: Structural and electronic properties of c-BN(110) surface and surface point defects
